## ViewFunction type

View function type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ViewFunction<State, Components extends Record<string, unknown>> = (ctx: {
    state: State;
    components: {
        [K in keyof Components]: ComponentView;
    };
}) => ViewNode;
```
**References:** [ComponentView](./dsl.componentview.md)<!-- -->, [ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md)

## Remarks

The view function is registered via [AppBuilder.view()](./dsl.appbuilder.view.md) and is called on every render cycle. It receives the current state and component views, and returns a [ViewNode](./dsl.viewnode.md) tree to display.
